ack.p: We thank Prof. Jan Bloemendal, Mr. Iain MacRae and Ms. Mary McPherson for their language editing of this work. This work was supported by the Scientific Research Foundation of the Third Institute of Oceanography (Grant No. 2014031), the Ecological Environment Protection Division, the State Oceanic Administration (SOA), Chinese Projects for Investigations and Assessments of the Arctic and Antarctic (CHINARE 04-03-07) and by the China Scholarship Council (201404180008).
